# Appendix 2 {.unnumbered #appendix2}

```{r dataapp}
meta <- read.csv(here::here("data","metadata","metadata.csv")) |>
        dplyr::mutate(
          uid = glue::glue("[{uid}]({uid_url})"),
          name = glue::glue("[{name}]({url})")
        )
dplyr::select(meta, uid, name, description, timespan, access, contact, source) |>
knitr::kable(
  col.names = c("UID", "Name","Description","Timespan","Access date","Contacts","Source"),
  row.names = FALSE,
  caption = "List of data used for the cumulative effects assessment of global changes on the ecological communities of the Scotian Shelf."
) 
```
